channel.title: Aeon ~ Server testers needed!
channel.description: Hello everyone. Lil_Smoker and I are creating a server called Aeon. During testing it's going to stay Hamachi. We need 2-3 testers to help test the game. These testers will be rewarded with items and (maybe staff positions). These testers will be given the items they need to test. If you're interested, please PM me. I don't have to put screenies. If you don't want to trust us, don't download and play. Testers that, ironically, do not test will be ip-banned for as long as the server is in testing mode. In addition, I expect a list of things that need done by next Saturday, 4/12/14. PM me for more info.

item.title: Aeon ~ Server testers needed!
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

There isn’t a place to post a thread that exclusively pertains to gathering beta testers on the forums, so I’m afraid I’ll have to lock this thread. Feel free to create a server development thread and throw in a little tidbit about gathering beta testers there, though.

Read full topic

item.title: Aeon ~ Server testers needed!
item.dc:creator: @Hugh_Jass Hugh Jass
item.description:
@Hugh_Jass wrote:

Hello everyone. Lil_Smoker and I are creating a server called Aeon. During testing it’s going to stay Hamachi. We need 2-3 testers to help test the game. These testers will be rewarded with items and (maybe staff positions). These testers will be given the items they need to test. If you’re interested, please PM me. I don’t have to put screenies. If you don’t want to trust us, don’t download and play. Testers that, ironically, do not test will be ip-banned for as long as the server is in testing mode. In addition, I expect a list of things that need done by next Saturday, 4/12/14. PM me for more info.

Read full topic
